rows.label: qst702404_msg0001
rows.name:
Hello there! Been a while!
How're you holding up?

rows.label: qst702404_msg0002
rows.name: Huh? What am I doing in the capital?

rows.label: qst702404_msg0003
rows.name:
Well, I travel wherever the winds take
me, searching the world for treasure,
like some kind of covetous tumbleweed.

rows.label: qst702404_msg0004
rows.name:
But every tumbleweed needs a base of
sorts to adventure from! ...No, wait.
Suddenly the metaphor breaks down...

rows.label: qst702404_msg0005
rows.name:
Anyway, what I'm saying is, this
rootless wanderer is looking for
somewhere to belong right now.

rows.label: qst702404_msg0006
rows.name:
Beg pardon? Why don't I
join the militia, then?

rows.label: qst702404_msg0007
rows.name:
Ahahahaha! Good one, friend! Ahh,
I love a good chuckle. Can you
imagine? Me, in the militia?! Ahah!

rows.label: qst702404_msg0009
rows.name:
It might be a nice change from selfish
tumbleweedery, to put down roots and
protect something bigger than myself...

rows.label: qst702404_msg0010
rows.name:
...Still, I'm not used to roots.
I'll have to mull this over.

rows.label: qst702404_msg0011
rows.name:
Sorry, but you can't have
my answer just yet. Lemme
get back to you, OK?

rows.label: qst702404_msg0012
rows.name:
Oh, don't make that face. I know
where the militia camp is.

rows.label: qst702404_msg0013
rows.name:
If I decide to accept your kind
invitation, I'll go straight there.

rows.label: qst702404_msg0014
rows.name:
But if I tumble away in the night,
and you never see me again... That,
too, will be your answer.

rows.label: qst702404_msg0101
rows.name:
Sorry again, but I'll need some time
to think about this carefully.

rows.label: qst702404_msg0102
rows.name:
If I decide to join up,
I'll be sure to pay the
militia encampment a visit!
